title: Google\Cloud\Optimization\V1\Location
name: Location
description:
Encapsulates a location (a geographic point, and an optional heading).

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.optimization.v1.Location

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.heading
params.description: The compass heading associated with the direction of the flow of traffic. This value is used to specify the side of the road to use for pickup and drop-off. Heading values can be from 0 to 360, where 0 specifies a heading of due North, 90 specifies a heading of due East, etc.

methods.name: getLatLng
methods.description:
The waypoint's geographic coordinates.

Generated from protobuf field .google.type.LatLng lat_lng = 1;

methods.name: setLatLng
methods.description:
The waypoint's geographic coordinates.

Generated from protobuf field .google.type.LatLng lat_lng = 1;

methods.description:

This value is used to specify the side of the road to use for pickup and drop-off. Heading values can be from 0 to 360, where 0 specifies a heading of due North, 90 specifies a heading of due East, etc.

Generated from protobuf field optional int32 heading = 2;
